website_summaries.verdict: This solidly made and personality-packed Dragonite figure is a fun toy for Pokémon fans ages 4 and older.
pros: Dragonite looks just like it does in the video games
Articulated wings, head, arms, and legs
cons: Any complaints would be minor nitpicks

customer_reviews.title: WCT Redemption!
customer_reviews.text: Flawless paint application. Colors are accurate and figure sculpt is perfect. The articulation is great with soft moving joints. The seem in the chest is the only awkward thing about this figure. It has no blemishes or imperfections. Super happy WCT is trying to perfect their figures and live up to the TOMY era of figures.
customer_reviews.author: KNUCKLES

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: We had seen this product at Disney fro double the price. My son was so happy and surprised to get it for Christmas from Santa! Great detail perfect gift and addition to his collection
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Hesles

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the figure! I just wished that they made it stand better. Other that that awesome figure!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Morris

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised! Not 12”
customer_reviews.text: This Pokémon is about 7” NOT 12”. See photo. My son saved his money to buy this thinking it was as advertised. The seller needs to change the description.
customer_reviews.author: S L

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I received the Gyarados epic first and was so impressed I got this one for my wife, and while it looks great, the lack of a stand is what kills this one. It is weighted poorly and instantly falls over with the slightest rumble. Might make my own stand, but definitely a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Skeith

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids that like Pokémon
customer_reviews.text: This is a larger Pokémon figure. It is sturdy and well made, a kid can’t brake this. My son collects Pokémon figures and he likes this one. He has fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My little guys love this figure. It did arrive late, but I figure that’s due to the coronavirus and things running a little behind.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Shelbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. My son wanted a couple bigger pokemon to play with and this was perfect. Came in new condition in original box. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money but nice toy
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a huge package but it’s a much smaller toy, seems a bit odd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality 👌
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality and super big I didn't expect it to be so large but it was a plus
customer_reviews.author: Hector Salgado

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little pokemon lover. It's actually larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Streit

customer_reviews.title: Its okay but....
customer_reviews.text: My kids played with it for a little while and it looks a little cheap
customer_reviews.author: CarterOrdaz

customer_reviews.title: My 5 years old nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to nephew as a present. He loves it. That's all that matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: lezandar

customer_reviews.title: Product size
customer_reviews.text: My kid informs me that this figure is not 12 inches tall. It may equal 12 inches if you add up all the dimensions but it is only about 6" tall. The product description leads you to think that it should be 12" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R Dolce

customer_reviews.title: The mighty Dragonite!
customer_reviews.text: I may not know much about Dragonite, but this toy is something!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Pokémon lover
customer_reviews.text: Just what my Pokémon lover wanted and a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wallace80

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, wish we got a standard happy one though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great! my 4 year old loves it. It's much larger than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Oh, that's great.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is very funny, my son likes it very much, he is very happy, I am very happy, it is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Christenbury

customer_reviews.title: Not 12”
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to say that this is not a 12” toy. It measures 8” tall at best. It’s still a good toy tho.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carr

customer_reviews.title: good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Not 12" as advertised, more like 8". It is still a good size, but 4" is a huge difference when it comes to figures. it also has a noticeable seam that runs down the belly. I still think it is worth getting, considering the fact that they don't make dragonite figs that often or that big.
customer_reviews.author: Anime & all things Awesome

product_meta.title: Pokémon 12" Epic Battle Figure - Dragonite
product_meta.description: The 12" EPIC Dragonite Pokémon figure is here and ready for battle! When it comes to Pokémon battles, Dragonite is as powerful as they come and is known as one of the strongest Dragon types ever! Add it to your team or pit it against your other Pokémon figures (sold separately) to replicate your favorite battles from the show! This awesome 12” in-scale figure features authentic details and multiple points of articulation so you can get the perfect pose for Dragonite. Gotta Catch ‘Em All™! Suitable for ages 4 years and up.
feature_bullets: 12” highly detailed and articulated large Pokémon action figure
Perfect for Pokémon fans of all ages!
Official licensed Pokémon product by the Pokémon Company

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars308 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
